price: 41. Reer Caadna (waxaa ku sugan calaamo lagu waano qaato) markaan ku dirnay dabeyl ma dhaleys ah6.
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ
footnotes: 6. Aan dhalin wax faa’ido ah, khayr daran, macnaha waa shar xambaarsan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wafī ʿādin idh arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-rīḥa al-ʿaqīma
